summary: Access data on Dropbox including files, folders, and search functionality.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Means of authenticating with Dropbox service (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (File, Folder, Search, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the file or folder to perform the operation on.

parameters.name: toPath
parameters.description: The destination path for the file or folder operation.
